column5: Just wondering since bass Pro in Toronto has them.
You sure those aren't channel cats?
no the board says Blue cats, its the really big one.
Cool, I thought they would have stuck to stocking local fish in that thing.  I'll have to look for that beast the next time I'm at BPS!
No blue cats anywhere in Canada
We got them here and man o man are you missing out on a great fish to play with.   Art
